cu.explanation_en: Setting the gNB name to an empty string will cause identification and logging issues in the CU configuration.

du.explanation_en: Setting the SD to an invalid hex format (0x01020304) will cause parsing errors during DU configuration validation.
du.explanation_zh: 將 SD 設定為無效的十六進制格式 (0x01020304) 會在 DU 配置驗證期間造成解析錯誤。
